com.netflix.netty.common

Class HttpRequestReadTimeoutHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • com.netflix.netty.common.HttpRequestReadTimeoutHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler

    public class HttpRequestReadTimeoutHandler
extends io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
    This handler times from the point a HttpRequest is read until the LastHttpContent is read, and fires a HttpRequestTimeoutEvent if that time has exceed the configured timeout. Unlike ReadTimeoutHandler, this impl does NOT close the channel on a timeout. Only fires the event.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler
